item.Title: 16:9 video Example
item.copy:
16:9 video Example
You can add any size video to this gallery and it will always maintain aspect ratio in fullscreen mode. The width and height of each video can be defined in the XML. You can add video formats such as FLV, MP4 and MOV.

item.Title: Flash Animation Example: Circles
